participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Warm and nurturing, with a strong sense of resilience and creativity.
participant_1.background: i've amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i am retired and living the great life.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, with a love for outdoor activities and sports.
participant_2.background: i live in a rural farming community. i have a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey. i enjoy coloring books.
